questions.questionText: Write a single instead-of trigger that enables simultaneous updates to attributes mID, title, and/or stars in view LateRating. Combine the view-update policies of the questions 1-3 in the core set, with the exception that mID may now be updated. Make sure the ratingDate attribute of view LateRating has not also been updated -- if it has been updated, don't make any changes.
Write an instead-of trigger that enables insertions into view HighlyRated.
Write an instead-of trigger that enables insertions into view NoRating.
Write an instead-of trigger that enables deletions from view HighlyRated.
Write an instead-of trigger that enables deletions from view NoRating.
